text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly addresses how to justify the requested provisions to the founders by framing them as value-adds or standard practice that protects all parties. For example, under section 2.A, the justification for Information & Reporting Rights is: \"Position it as \u201ctransparent governance that helps all shareholders understand the business and plan follow\u00adon financing together.\u201d Furthermore, the final section, \"Pitch script,\" is dedicated entirely to providing founder-focused benefits and quick lines for justifying each ask, which directly supports the criterion's requirement.", "criterion_id": "f1c2a174-604b-4677-be71-ea5f85e43f60"}
